meanings.definition: In a manner related to the movement or orientation of an organism in response to light.
meanings.sent1: The plant grew phototactically towards the sunlight streaming through the window.
meanings.sent2: The insects moved phototactically towards the bright lamp in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat phototactically followed the laser pointer around the room, trying to catch it.
meanings.sent4: Like a sunflower, she turned phototactically towards the source of warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The fireflies danced phototactically in the dark, creating a mesmerizing display of light.

meanings.definition: Relating to the behavior of an organism in response to light.
meanings.sent1: The phototactically active organisms thrived in the sunny meadow.
meanings.sent2: The phototactically sensitive plants wilted in the shade.
meanings.sent3: The phototactically inclined birds chirped happily under the morning sun.
meanings.sent4: Her phototactically driven behavior led her to always seek out sunny spots.
meanings.sent5: The phototactically aware animals knew exactly when to come out of their burrows.
